Subject: SanDisk Extreme Portable SSB External USB not recognised
Description:
SanDisk Extreme Portable SSB External USB not recognised model SDSSDE60-1TOO Device Code 03725DBE Serial 323334353630343034303530
SanDisk Extreme Portable SSB External USB not recognised model SDSSDE61-2TOO Device Code D12B4FEC Serial 323030323247343032383137

I have 2 of these and each one is not being recognised and will not mount as read only and wont mount at all
Please can you categorise it as as USB or white list as read-only . I spoke with Arpitha and she informed me some devices are not recognised by EPP
test machine i was working on in test env MACFVFDV5QMQ05P
Troubleshooting: I managed to find an old samsung usb, format it as exfat and that mounts fine as read only so it isnt a problem with the client machine etc
What_We_Know__c: The customer wants to deploy easylock on a device with multiple partitions which is not supported
Next_Steps__c: I asked for a workaround if possible
Solution_Comment__c: EasyLock can not be deployed on Storage devices with multiple partitions.
